sentences.en: a glass of beer with a good head of foam
sentences.cn: 上面有厚厚一层泡沫的一杯啤酒

sentences.en: Aphrodite , the Greek goddness of love, is fabled to have been born of the foam of the sea.
sentences.cn: 希腊爱神阿美罗狄蒂据说是诞生于海浪泡沫之中.

sentences.en: Bring a sleeping bag and foam mat.
But he ducked and the white foam spattered on to the floor.
sentences.cn: 但是他猛地一躲,白白的肥皂沫全都溅到了地板上了.

sentences.en: Foam rubber is soft rubber full of small air - bubbles.
sentences.cn: 泡沫橡胶是充满了小气泡的软橡胶.
泡沫橡胶隔绝性能良好.

sentences.en: I skimmed the foam from the boiling syrup.
sentences.cn: 我撇去了煮沸糖浆上的泡沫.

sentences.en: She sat there, reclined against a foam rubber cushion.
sentences.cn: 她在那儿倚靠着海绵橡胶垫坐着.

sentences.en: The glass of beer was mostly foam.
sentences.cn: 这杯啤酒大部分是泡沫。

sentences.en: The green water splashed and foamed over the rocks.
sentences.cn: 碧绿的水花四溅，岩石上满是泡沫。

sentences.en: The oil is used to flavour and perfume soaps, foam baths, and scents.
sentences.cn: 这种精油用来给肥皂、沐浴液和香水添加香味。

sentences.en: The pond is speckled with foam.
sentences.cn: 池塘里有一点一点的水泡.

sentences.en: The sea was covered in foam.
The surface of the water is full of foam.
The water curved round the rocks in great bursts of foam.
sentences.cn: 水流撞击岩石，产生大量泡沫。

sentences.en: We had given him a large foam mattress to sleep on.
sentences.cn: 我们给了他一张大海绵床垫用来睡觉。

sentences.en: We see foam on water with a lot of soap in it.
sentences.cn: 我看到水上有肥皂泡沫.

words.tran_cn: 泡沫的；起泡沫的；全是泡沫的
起泡沫；吐白沫；起着泡沫流动

phrases.tran_cn: 泡沫塑料；泡沫聚苯乙烯
聚氨酯泡沫塑料；泡沫聚氨酯；聚氨酯泡沫体；聚乌拉坦泡沫胶
泡沫橡胶；海绵橡胶；多孔橡胶

trans.tran_cn: 泡沫，泡沫材料，泡沫状物
trans.tran_en: a type of soft rubber with a lot of air in it, used in furniture

trans.tran_cn: 起泡沫；吐白沫；起着泡沫流动
使起泡沫，使成泡沫状物
